title: Pannipitiya - Residential Land for Sale
details:
*Land Extent 17 perches.
*300m to Bogaha Junction on High Level Road [Earlier known as ‘Kandhu Dekha Junction’]
*Close Proximity to;
450Mn to Pannipitiya junction / Railway Station / 174 Road.
1.5Km to Maharagama Town.
350M to Pannipitiya Keells Super Market.
01Km to Pannipitiya Dharampala College.
*Water / Electricity available.
*12 Ft inner road with a Turning cycle.

*Genuine Buyers only / No Brokers.
*Price is Slightly negotiable.
